# Byte-compiled files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Virtual environments
.env/
.venv/
env/
venv/

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# System files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs and debug files
*.log
*.out
*.err

# Python packages
*.egg
*.egg-info/
dist/
build/
*.whl

# IDE configurations
.vscode/
.idea/
*.iml

# Generated files
*.h5
*.pth
*.ckpt
*.onnx
*.npy
*.npz

# Test results
coverage/
*.cover

# Documentation
docs/_build/

# Custom additions for datasets
data/raw/
data/processed/
